strings.GADGET_DESCRIPTION: Thesaurus lookup for different languages including English, German, Dutch and Spanish.
strings.GADGET_ABOUT_TEXT:
Thesaurus ©2008 Benjamin Schirmer Thesaurus lookup for different languages.
Used resoucses: ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ English Thesaurus using Aiksaurus http://aiksaurus.sourceforge.net/
German, Dutch and Spanish by OpenThesaurus Project http://www.openthesaurus.de/ http://www.opentaal.org/opentaalbank/thesaurus http://openthes-es.berlios.de/
Icons by the great FamFamFam icon pack http://www.famfamfam.com
strings.strLookupFailed: No thesaurus found for this word.
strings.strWebsiteFailed: Could not connect to thesaurus webpage. Please check your internet connection!
strings.strWordRequest: Please enter a word to look up.
